## Plotly Example - Randomly Generated Numbers

```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(plotly))
set.seed(250)
x1 <- runif(200,0,5)
x2 <- x1 + rnorm(200)

suppressMessages(plot_ly(x=x1,y=x2,mode="markers"))
```
